name: Keystone
description:
A fun and engaging adventure through the wilds!

Control your gooey hero as he goes on a quest to recover the broken gem shards of the Keystone. Count up the gems to win the game. But beware the dangerous hazards of the Shimmering Forest!

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
2x Space - Double Jump

CREDITS

Art, Level Layout and Design - Will Kosan
Character and Animations - Garrett DeHart
Blueprint Help - Taylor Driggs
Testing and Sound Curation - Josh Lowry
Moral Support for Will - Everyone
